Package io.elegie.luchess.core.indexing.adapters.file

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileSelector
    This interface represents a selection strategy for files, so that a FileSourceDataSet knows whether to accept a given file, to feed its contents to some GameIndexer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileEncodingSniffer
    This class uses the Mozilla Char Detector, in order to determine which charset is used for a given file.
    FileSourceDataSet
    A SourceDataSet implementation for the file system.
    FileSourceDataUnit
    A SourceDataUnit implementation based on a file.
    PGNFileSelector
    A selector that accepts only PGN files.
